attributes.action: The campaign for Grandparents to have rights to see their Grandchildren.org.UK.
attributes.additional_details:
there are approximately 14 million families that are lousing out, so now I’m calling Grandparents across the country to unit and to join up to get the law change. So, we are not segregated any longer. I’m asking Grandparents to contacted me and support this campaign.
Seeing your children go through a divorce is understandably a challenging time, and when they have children of their own, the process can become even more difficult, so you might be wondering ‘do grandparents have rights?’.
attributes.background: My name is Terrence Mullett I’m the father of four children and grandfather of more than twelve grandchildren. They live all over the country some in the isle of wight. Some in Summerset & some in London, and like many other grandparents because they have broken  Down

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Give grandparents the legal right to see their Grandchildren
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600326
